example.eg: You offered me wine and soda, but I'll have water instead.
example.egtrans: 你给我提供了葡萄酒和苏打水，但我想喝水。

example.eg: At Christmas, she cooks a nut roast instead of turkey.
example.egtrans: 圣诞节她会烤坚果糕而非火鸡。

example.eg: I watched TV instead of doing my homework.
example.egtrans: 我没做作业，而是看电视了。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 而非做某事, 没有做某事，而是

example.eg: I took out the old lightbulb and put in a new energy-efficient bulb in its stead.
example.egtrans: 我取下旧灯泡，换上了新的节能灯泡。
